metadata.name: Program Executed Using Proxy/Local Command Via SSH.EXE
metadata.comment: Detect usage of the "ssh.exe" binary as a proxy to launch other programs.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\openssh\\\\sshd.exe') OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\ssh.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('proxycommand=')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('permitlocalcommand')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('localcommand'))))

output.summary: Detect usage of the "ssh.exe" binary as a proxy to launch other programs.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage for administration purposes References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Ssh/, https://github.com/LOLBAS-Project/LOLBAS/pull/211/files, https://gtfobins.github.io/gtfobins/ssh/, https://man.openbsd.org/ssh_config#ProxyCommand, https://man.openbsd.org/ssh_config#LocalCommand
